thread.title: HEMET: Council to hear budget report
thread.title_full: HEMET: Council to hear budget report - Press Enterprise

author: CRAIG SHULTZ
title: HEMET: Council to hear budget report
text:
BY CRAIG SHULTZ / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 26, 2015 10:33 a.m. HEMET: Council to hear budget report Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» The Hemet City Council will hear a a quarterly budget report when it meets Tuesday, Oct. 27. At their previous meeting, the panel approved a 5-year plan to help balance the budget.
The council also will vote on adding two stop signs and selling some city property during the consent portion of the meeting.
The meeting begins at 7 p.m. in Council Chambers, 450 E. Latham Ave.
Contact the writer: 951-368-9086 or cshultz@pe.com
